page.title: 13Teenage Fashion
page.content: Older people call the fashions worn by teenagers outrageous and say they have no "dress sense".Tight clothes are on the way out and baggy clothes are very chic .Many teenagers hand paint their clothes ,bright colours and flower designs are all the rage.Many styles from past decades have come back into fashion and youngsters are wearing clothes 'dug out'of their parents and grandparent's wardrobes .Trowsers which come half way up the shin are often worn,as are V-backed jumpers and bat-wing jumpers.Jewellery worn in the 80's is often: made of plastic,chunky, clumsy and cheap.Some people reassemble bought jewellery to suit their own tastes. Rings are often worn through the side of the nose.Many people have pierced ears.Many teen- agers dye their hair bright colours, cut it or set it into strange styles.
